about_the_game:
You are a artificial being made by Dr.Frankenstein- a creation, stitched from the limbs of humans. Ever since you were created, you were locked up in a underground cell of a giant mansion. People called you, a nameless being, 'Bride', as you were destined to become the 'creature's' bride. And now, after numerous years of patience, the story begins as your great creator calls you in need for help.

Intense Stealth Action




ride is a young and imperfect being, not even able to speak a proper language with lack of education. Naturally, she lacks the power to face an enemy head-to-head. Utilize your wits and wisely break through the giant mansion. Feel the tension of stealth as a powerless being without ally. Adventure, and grasp freedom!


Electric Interaction Based On ‘Galvanism’




Bride can use supernatural powers based on ‘Galvanism’; she can electrify conductors or absorb electricity. Using this simple power, you can derive various interactions such as electrifying a metal pipe and starting a machine attached, or absorbing the electricity of a generator and turning off the lights.



Bride's imperfect powers matures through the journey. You can also use advanced skills such as turning into a electric current and dashing across a conductor, creating temporary blackouts, and more. Fully utilize your powers, and overcome the given challenges!


Dr.Frankestein's eerie mansion



Bride, freed from the underground cell that restricted her, now ventures the great mansion of Frankenstein. To overcome her destiny, and in search of her creator.



the great mansion is full of ‘Galvani-Punk’ gadgets, which uses the power of bioelectricity. An engine that runs attached machines using the power of the thumping heart, a hunting trophy that was revived and works in security, …
These gadgets, mainly a obstacle to come across, can be used in various ways, also in your favor as well.



Not only that, but also guards and other creations by Frankenstein, roams the great mansion in search of you. Evade your enemies and progress deeper into the great mansion. Get through the conspiracy encompassing, and find a new ending from your own choices!


'Galvanic Bride' started development from 2022, and exhibited in the 2023 Busan IndieConnect Festivals as its only Stealth Game.
The game was also enlisted on other online exibitions such as BIGS2022&2023, and Burning Beaver 2022.
